name: BotiBoi
description:
Gameplay Instructions:

Help BotiBoi gather as many files as possible and upload them to the server before the inevitable system crash. Be quick and avoid bumpers and bugs. Compete with your friends for the highest spot on the high-score table. 

Controls:

[WSAD]    to move around

[SPACE]    to jump and double jump

[L.SHIFT]    to dash and double dash

[LMB] or [E]    to upload

[ESC] or [P]    to pause
